txt.en: 'Soon as I'm off duty, I'm heading to the Pony for a pint!'
I don't trust that Thornley fella. Nice a 'im ta bring work ta the area but I just don't trust 'im.
'Beautiful weather we're having, ain't it? For the season anyways.'
'Any word from Archet? Heard they had a bit o' trouble down that way.'
'You're not one o' them stragglers from the south are you?'
'I told Adso setting shop up on the East Road's a fool's errand, but there's nothing for it now.'
'Lot o' strange folk in these parts lately, and no good'll come of it, you mark my words.'
'Been meaning to polish the old armour lately, just haven't gotten 'round to it.'
Beautiful day were havin' ain't it?
